casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
John RASPATELLO, Petitioner No. 56 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 11, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 11th day of January, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED. The Counsel's Second Petition for Leave to Withdraw Appearance is GRANTED.
